website_summaries.verdict: This is a no-kidding-around cincher/corset and its sturdy construction will cinch the waist by several inches.
pros: Features 24 steel bones, of which 20 are spiral steel and four are flat steel
The cincher is comfortable and produces a true hourglass figure
cons: Like many cinchers, it may run small, so buyers will need to look at the sizing chart
Novice wearers should avoid lacing the cincher too tightly

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING quality!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING quality!! I'm honestly a little shocked that it's so well made for the price. Absolutely top notch, heavy-duty boning. It's a great starter-corset if you've never worn a steel-boned corset before. It's a bit smaller than expected (I'm 34"/24.5"/36", and ordered an 18") but I think it's because of the differential between my chest, waist, and hips that does it. Otherwise, I'm very happy with it, and look forward to wearing it more!
customer_reviews.author: C. Whittington

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy!
customer_reviews.text: This corset came right on time! Out of the box, it seemed well weighted. Upon the fitting, I noticed it didn't rumple, ripple, or wrinkle. It's great and gives me that wasp waist! Also, it's very smooth under any clothes and the modesty panel has a good length to it.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Package was 10/10 Fabric 10/10 Lining 9/10 Steel 7/10 Shape 10/10 Lacing 10/10 Front clasps 7/10 (uneven) Will update review with seasoning progress or if there are any problems Please note in photos it is not fully fastened as its new and needs to be seasoned. It does what is advertised and thus far seems like a great buy. Ignore empty toilet paper roll.
customer_reviews.author: Bang

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money! I was looking at getting a corset for awhile now. I was looking at some on facebook for well over $100. Then I found this! So glad I thought to check amazon first! The steel bones in this are amazing! I took a magnet to it to make sure and it stuck to the corset! I am seasoning it and so far so good! I cant wait until I can size down! I know where to look when I am able to close this corset and can move down to a smaller size! So worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley ann

customer_reviews.title: Incredible corset for an incredible price!
customer_reviews.text: Over the past year I have been exploring corsets and have a nice collect so far, I recently received this corset as a gift and I have to say it has quickly become one of my favorites. I love it so much I just had to order it in white and I will also order it in black next time I order. The construction is pretty amazing and for the price the quality is unbelievable! I highly recommend this corset. I will try to attach a pic of me wearing it paired with a little black dress. I'm 6'0" and about 155 and ordered a size 26"
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Made for big boobs
customer_reviews.text: I am very well aware that this corset is an “under boob” style, so you’d think your own cup size wouldn’t matter, right? Wrong. It fits me fine everywhere except the underboob. I or my husband can tighten it all day long until I can’t breathe, and there is still just way too much material up top. I vary between a 36C/34D, size 8 waist/hips. It looks like you’d need to be a 40EE to make the top look “right”. I’d return it if I hadn’t worn it around already just trying everything to make it work. Would not recommend unless you’re more top heavy. Definitely not made for us pear shaped ladies.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hutton

customer_reviews.title: 'Label this review so..'
customer_reviews.text: This corset is almost as good quality as my others which are from a more expensive company. The fit was good I have weird measurements so it's close enough.. What I mean is I'm Bust: 48.5 Under bust 44 natural wasit 48 and hips 52.5 length from armpit to over my hip is about 16.5 inches meaning I normally order long corsets. This 1 is normal but fits how I need it for a dress to hid a belly roll..I've been wearing corsets off and on for years this 1 is the best price I've seen for how fast it shipped and arrived. Bra size 42-44 G/H pants size 18-22 and 265lbs at 5ft5
customer_reviews.author: Q. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: New to Corsets? But this one! You won’t regret it!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this not really knowing what to expect...I mean it’s a $40 corset right? But oh em gee it’s amazing! You can’t tell from my picture but I did snatch my waist quite a bit and granted it’s my first time using a real corset so I struggled lacing it up. With time I’m sure it’ll be easier and look much better. The bones in it are so far real good and very sturdy. I absolutely love it!!! I only wish it came in other cute colors but whatever this is a great product. Totally recommend for beginners. I bought my size according to the size chart and it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Krumbholz

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, terrible sizing
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this corset is pretty nice for the money. It's a great material and seems to be constructed very well. The sizing is WAY off though. I measured myself 5 times just to make sure that I was ordering the right size (used the seller's size chart) and this corset was WAY too small. Definitely go up one size AT LEAST. Thank goodness I ordered another corset from another seller so that I will have time to season it in time for my event.
customer_reviews.author: Cristi M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful. I'm 5'6", 25" waist (26"-30" after a meal) and got the smallest size in rust, because at $19 that's dirt cheap for a corset and corsets work better if they're a smidge too small, no? (I managed to get down to a 23.5" for those wondering.) I plan on making my own hourglass Victorian corsets for reenactments and cosplay, but for now this will work for the base of a Madam Red costume I'm making for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake Monster

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Strong
customer_reviews.text: H I love this corset. I ordered the Medium, my measurements are: BUST: 37" WAIST: 31" HIPS: 38" It has a generous modesty panel, so even though I'm nowhere near able to tightlace yet, it's not unbearably roll-y in the back. It is steel-boned and very sturdy, and quite comfortable on. The fabric (I ordered the Blue w/ silver floral design) is beautiful, and the construction of the corset is well-done. I would recommend this corset!
customer_reviews.author: Makayla

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality as usual!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality!!! Very happy with this-- as advertised, true to measured size, and even when I had to order a size down it fit very well!!! Seams and layering are very well reinforced and can handle tight lacing without distortion. It's a heavy-weighted item, and the steel boning is of good quality. Felt very well-supported throughout the entirety of our parade, and received many compliments!! Thanks and will be ordering from you again!
customer_reviews.author: Amber L

customer_reviews.title: Easily a $200 corset
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I spent what I did on this. This is an extremely well put together corset. Strong stitching, real steel boned, fits like a glove. Off the rack, this could be priced for hundreds of dollars. Absolutely gorgeous! Edit: This is not a novice corset. Only those who have worn one for longer than an hour (I'm an avid SCA event go'er. )or have already done waist training will appreciate these corsets. I wish I had bought this years ago. I will post pictures when I have them available.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne F.

customer_reviews.title: No way.  Exercise and diet is 100x easier and more effective
customer_reviews.text: Good Lawd!!! You have to be nuts to think this is conducive to life. If you’re doing this much work, you can watch diet and exercise. It is uncomfortable and if you thought other articles of clothing made your fat stick out just you wait. Seth it back.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Yes.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cheap corset. It's still cheap, don't get me wrong, and you shouldn't use it as actual shapewear long term (I do, though) but this is heads and shoulders above any other budget corset I've tried. I know a lot of other people had issues with defective products, but I did not, and I'm very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Helen K

customer_reviews.title: Could of went down a size
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and it came in within days. It laced with ease and pulled me in 2 to 3 inches without any discomfort. The laces are shoe lace type but not uncomfortable at all. I got the wine because I didn't want a plain one. It looks fabulous. It is a nice weighted one too. Sort of heavy at first but you get used to it. I will definitely purchase another when time to size down. I was a original 37 inch with it on I'm at 35. I got the 30 inch one. I feel it's made a bit bigger so I prolly could of got away with a bit smaller.
customer_reviews.author: CATHY

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to follow the size chart correctly
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake to buy a size smaller to save some money in the future, so it was a little too small for me. I can still wear it but it can be uncomfortable with certain positions since it feels like the back parts stab me. So following the chart is important so it doesnt stab you on the back when you move or sit straight. But other than that great texture, it doesnt stretch, stays in place and I'm sure it will give me the results I want.
customer_reviews.author: Gcortez

customer_reviews.title: A high quality corset without the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Had to wear this under a bridesmaid dress. I 'seasoned' it like the internet said I should. ALL the boning is definitely steel, I bought the white one. The steel boning does flex appropriately as it seasons but doesn't bend like plastic would. I have 2 expensive steel boned corsets, both over $100. I have 2 costume corsets from Amazon I bought for about $30 each. This corset is on par with my expensive corsets. Don't be afraid of buying this one, at least the white one. I will never buy $100 corsets if I can get this quality at this price!
customer_reviews.author: A. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great for waist training! It's a real corset!
customer_reviews.text: It's great for waist training! It takes off 6 to 8 inches off my waist I just had to break it in first. I had a 34 inch waist so I got a size 24 inch and now I can completely close it after wearing it to bed every night for a month. My natural waist is now 30 inches without the corset and I have also lost 15 lbs. I love waist training and I love the feeling of lacing tight.
customer_reviews.author: Experienced user

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on but love it otherwise
customer_reviews.text: May be too small. The only direction are on an attached tag and says to loosen and put it on over your head. Not gonna' happen. So, I unclasped the clasps & folded it around me. The clasps are VERY difficult to re-clasp. I have about a 2 1/2" gap. Not sure if I should exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: The product is amazing, it fits as expected and the corset really does its job. The only thing is it’s durablity. I’ve worn it 6 times a week, 12-16 hours a day and had not washed it once in fear of its durability. Well that didn’t help as it started to tear after 6 weeks of use, and as of this morning, it tore from the buttons down. It’s a good buy but for 4-6 weeks tops.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my love
customer_reviews.text: I love that its breathable mesh fabric and gives a classic or Gothic sexy look under or over any outfit. I bought this corset for butlesque so let's just say hours of wear at a time and I stayed cool and comfortable yet very very sturdy and strong. It has held up for almost 3 years now and im still in love!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Just got this the other day... I am 5'3", 200lbs, usually a size 16-18 jeans, 41" waist and I got the size 34". Glad I did, because it's not too big and I loosened the laces almost to where the panel is just barely hiding the skin and laid on the floor to clip the front together. It's a perfect size. I just have to find someone to cinch me in it (haha). Update: I tried cinching it myself. It's great! Works well! When I sit it in, you can't slouch, it pushes your boobs up. It's nice! The fabric is a good quality, the boning seems to be a good, hard, strong quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This corset is the real deal and MUST be seasoned, you can't put this on and think it's outfit ready. I've been researching corsets and tight lacing for a few months now, I had a pretty good idea about wearing and self tightening them. Make sure the laces are fully loosened before putting on for the first time or closing it will be dang near impossible. My natural waist is a 30 I ordered a 22"
customer_reviews.author: Onlineshoppingaddict

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Even though it fits a little small i am very happy with my underbust corset. It is way better quality than i expected. The laces are a little cheap and tied together at the bottom which looks a little cheap if you are wearing it over your clothes. But for the price and the quality its awesome! One final thing, i have a longer torso, so i have to decide which part of it to not cover when wearing all standard corset. But for something completely perfect fit, you should get a custom which costs WAY more.
customer_reviews.author: PinUpMama

customer_reviews.title: this is an extremely well made garment perfect for tightlacing and waist training
customer_reviews.text: I have been a big fan of Playgirl corsets for some time now. Don't let the price fool you, this is an extremely well made garment perfect for tightlacing and waist training. I finally wore out one of my first PG corsets I bought over 3 years ago and wanted to try the underbust...excellent coverage. I am unfortunately going to have to exchange mine for a bigger size...the recommended sizing was a bit off for me. I would suggest going a size or two up. Otherwise, perfect product. Great for first timers wanting to experiment with corsets. I think I might need a few of these!
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: The perfect starter corset
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful corset for those wanting to get into waist training, as it is sturdy but affordable. It maintains its shape great and is very comfortable: I can wear it for nearly the whole day without discomfort. Just be sure to have it properly situated or you may feel some lower back pain. Remember that it must be "seasoned" by incrementally tightening it over several weeks or it may warp.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. I am 5' 3" 140lbs. My waist is a 32, my lower abdomen is a 35. My bust size is 34DD. (In case anyone else is wondering about height weight etc) I bought size 24. Fits well with my structure. Not to long or too short, fits right under my bust and on my hips. The structure is great, solid, not cheap. The material is great, the ties are great! Quality is So my posture is awesome while wearing. I do notice pressure on my ribs and abs, nothing painful. It's easily adjusted. I pull the ties super tight and stand clean vaccum etc.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole E

customer_reviews.title: Best corset I ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, highly superior product for this price range. Delivered on time with Prime shipping. I ordered the blue which has a subtle silver flower brocade and it's gorgeous. I have some experience with corsets though it had been a couple of years. With sufficient effort I was able to easily cinch the laces to a 1.5" opening by myself. The laces themselves are good strong quality. Will definitely be back for more! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amyzon

customer_reviews.title: exceptionally well made
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a few corsets over the years. This one is surprisingly well made and very strong for the price. definitely worth purchasing. I should have gotten a smaller one, but its ok. I love it. so I'll order another. you won't regret this purchase. awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: VERY WELL MADE CORSET, good value for the cost!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this corset to wear at my wedding. I was VERY PLEASED when it arrived. Its a very well made corset...not one of those cheap corsets with plastic boning, and lacing grommets that pull out of the fabric when you lace it up. I feel I got a great corset for a fair price. It is a quality corset, that should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Nanette Leonetti

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself the searching and treat yourself to this!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at potential waist cinchers and corsets for months and never wanted to risk getting ripped off. I went through countless websites and reviews and eventually decided to give this a try. It's amazing quality and definitely heavy duty. It's almost intimidating because I'm a newbie, but it's everything I was looking for. Beyond worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but I was specifically looking for something for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality but I was specifically looking for something for a long torso like mine And this was a suggestion. It shouldn't be. The curse of my long torso has made it loooong like life long hard to find clothes that fit well It sucks that I can't put this to good use because its too uncomfortable to place or really put on with all the extra torso it doesn't cover of course duuuh
customer_reviews.author: murray

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Piece..TBC on waist decrease
customer_reviews.text: The piece is lovely (great quality) and fits "tight!" That's a great thing because I can feel it working. However, I literally feel like I am out of breath so make sure to keep breathing when you have it on to avoid passing out. My goal is to get back into shape (post baby #2) and along the way get a smaller waist size. My waist is 31 inches right now. I hope to do a follow-up on ... did my waist size go down?
customer_reviews.author: dressler family

customer_reviews.title: Just a little not long enough, but still wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first real corset and I've been wearing it for two days now. It's comfortable and I do notice a difference in my shape when I take it off. I really do love it, but the only problem is I'm a mom and I do have the left over baby pooch so to speak which pushes out the bottom. I'm 5'2 140lbs Its just a little too short, BUT it's still wonderful and I ordered a longer one from the same company because the quality is so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Duckworth

customer_reviews.title: The quality seems really great. I commend the ladies out there who can ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first corset/waist trainer so I didn’t really know what to expect. The quality seems really great. I commend the ladies out there who can get the strings all pulled in and tightened by themselves because I really struggled with that part. There is a lot of extra string that hangs down awkwardly after you’ve tightened it, but otherwise I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not what they show.
customer_reviews.text: It is not an overbust corset like it shows in the picture. It is under bust and it takes a lot of time and effort to lace up. It’s at least very sturdy. It’s just not what they show in the picture. It only reduced my waist by 2”.
customer_reviews.author: Hawke

customer_reviews.title: A Real Corset!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a corset years ago from a very expensive store, just to have it buckle and ruined within a week. I was hesitant to purchase another, but for the price, I thought why not try again. This is such a well made product. When I picked it up I could feel the difference, the steel was heavy and reinforced by quality stitching and fabric. It takes a lot of work to actually follow thru with a waist training program, but if you are interested in trying; buy this corset!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: The good: appears to be well made
customer_reviews.text: The good: appears to be well made. The bad: I ordered a size smaller than recommended and i could have gone a size down from that and would've gotten the 6-7 inches as described. Had I ordered the suggested size, I think it should've been closed already or within an inch. Also, not good for longish torsos
customer_reviews.author: Tifany

customer_reviews.title: Corset training beginner.
customer_reviews.text: I love my corset! I bought it in a size 20' because 1: I was already on my way to getting my shape and just wanted extra help in getting the hour glass figure and 2: I really didn't want to order another one any time soon. It fit tight and I had to get used to wearing it but when I did it was really comfortable. I put on a layer of plastic wrap first because I do sweat with the corset on. These photos are before I put it on and after 5 days of wearing it for 6 hours a day. Looooove it! Festival season, here I come! ( sorry for the blurry photos)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how wonderful the quality of this corset is. It's near impossible to find a genuine steel boned corset for a decent price, and so many sellers claim to be selling authentic waist training corsets and are 100% lying, instead sending out plastic bone costume corsets. I absolutely love this. Putting it on for the first time I actually squealed, the fabric is heavy and smooth, the shape of the corset is beautiful, and the information provided by the seller made it easy to find the right size on the first try.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item! I started wearing corsets last year and I've tried the plastic boning ones which work good for a while but as I got used to it I wanted to try the metal boning. This item fits great, it's comfortable, very very very well made. I'm 5'5" 159lbs and I chose the 24" which fits perfectly. I do recommend this item if you are interested in shaping your body and looking good. You can't see it underneath clothes either. If you have back pain this actually helps and helps to correct your posture. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is honestly the best waist training corset out there for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly the best waist training corset out there for the price. After seasoning, this corset is very comfortable and can be worn all day no problem. I have been waist training for three years, so I know a good corset when I see one and for the price this is an amazing corset. I brought the rust for $28.00 and it is just as great as a $112.00 corset I brought a year ago. You can't go wrong with this buy ladies!
customer_reviews.author: Basic Witch

customer_reviews.title: Something special...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased the shorter waist clincher and had my sister "steal" it so I decided to replace it with this. I like that it's longer in the front so it covers my love (hate) handles and just as the other one it is durable, well-made and heavy (REAL steel)!! Unfortunately the back digs into my back and is quite uncomfortable. I wish they would line the flap of material in the back in silk or satin, SOMEthing to cut down on the rubbing. Other than that it REALLY does work. If anyone has any hints or tips with the back digging in please don't hesitate to comment!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: from the sturdy grommets to the busk
customer_reviews.text: First thing I noticed when I received my corset was exactly HOW HEAVY this is. It is a real-deal corset with metal hardware, and not cheap flimsy plastic boning. EVERYTHING about this corset is built to last, support and shape you, from the sturdy grommets to the busk. The laces themselves hold up very well with no evidence of wear or tear after hours and days of wearing this.. Honestly the best quality product I've seen to date and one of the best purchases I've made all year.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: I am in love <3
customer_reviews.text: This corset is the real deal! Its sturdy, it fit well but I really had to pay attention and get the right size. The fabric was beautiful and it was easy to cinch the corset up. I am extremely happy with this purchase. If I could find anything I didn't like was that I have a long waist and I am a bit on the heavier side so if it were a tad longer for the larger sizes it would be a bit more flattering below the hips.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Mary

customer_reviews.title: I didn't know what I was expecting from an average-priced waist trainer like this, but it's definitely steel boned
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually a corsetiere that needed a black corset for every day use and was too lazy to make one for herself (my other ones are used for waist-reduction in costumes, so they're far too loud for every day wear). I didn't know what I was expecting from an average-priced waist trainer like this, but it's definitely steel boned, it's definitely giving me waist support, and I've already gone down from 24" to 23" w/o corset and it's been three days.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Huang

customer_reviews.title: Love These! I have 3!
customer_reviews.text: This brand of corsets are perfect. They bend well when you wear them, but doesn't push into you or disform. They are really comfortable and can be worn under or over clothes. The fabric is soft and doesn't scratch at all. I always buy these when I want/need a new color/one.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Night quality corset
customer_reviews.text: I had to return due to an error I made with my measurements, however this is a high quality authentic corset that is perfect for waist training. I will be reordering this in my correct size.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I was searching all over the Internet for a decent priced corset that actually cinched and this is the one that I stumbled upon.This is my first corset and it’s tiny! I doubt I’ll ever be able to close it at 18 inches! But that’s okay. My natural waist is 24 in and I’m 5’1 ft for reference. It also feels very heavy and sturdy, so if your looking for a beginners corset at a low price, I’d recommend this one. Ps. MAKE SURE TO SEASON IT. If you don’t know what that means just look it up on youtube, you’ll find instructions to season or “break in” your corset
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meets my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Love it , material is very sturdy. One of the best corsets Play Girl, and I have bought several. The color is very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Laris

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a dream and I'm only halfway through seasoning it! (perfect for historical undergarments too)
customer_reviews.text: I was scared this wouldn't fit right because I have a slightly shorter torso than average but it's fantastic! It fits very well and I'm not even finished seasoning it! Busk, boning, and fabric are all very high quality and the construction is flawless. I used this for a two-hour historical event yesterday and it worked wonderfully. Super cheap for a high quality product, I will be purchasing from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sexy
customer_reviews.text: Great quality corset, such a good price. Make sure to order the right size, the chart they have in the photos is correct. It helps if you have someone help you put it on, especially if you’re new to this.
customer_reviews.author: Ines

customer_reviews.title: The corset itself is amazing. I purchased the garters from true corset that ...
customer_reviews.text: The corset itself is amazing. I purchased the garters from true corset that go with the corset, and they shredded the loops after one wear. My stockings kept falling down because the garters kept coming unattached and the loops were gradually fraying after ONE WEAR. I’ll keep the corset but I purchased it to be able to wear stockings and have a seamless look without a belt cutting into my skin. The corset itself is amazing and a good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my corset on Monday and received it by Thursday...that's amazing, very fast and I ordered standard shipping! When I opened up the package it looked just like what I ordered. ..actually it looked better! Everything about this product screams quality, it's heavy, the stitching is immaculate and the clasps on the front are very strong. Now Im 5.6' about 155 to 160 pounds I ordered a size 28 and to my wicked delight it fits great with room to pull tight! I hope this review helps the ladies who search & search for the most bang for her buck.....this company True Coset has something for every woman all shapes and sizes! Creme dela creme'
customer_reviews.author: Rexann P.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed with the quality of this corset. Great price and the delivery was fast. I would recommend it for anyone trying to get rid of some inches and looking for curves.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: love this brand
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd playgirl corset. I've ordered others from amazon but none have been as good. & just well made. I ordered a 28 inch because my 1st was a 32 inch and it was loose after wearing it for a month. I would suggest going smaller and just stretch the back because you do grow out of it. Yea, it's difficult wearing it all day and you can bend down to pick up stuff but it looks great stomach looks flat and waist looks small. Will definitely recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I love it ! I’ve tried so many different corsets/waist trainers. I’m apart of a waist training group on fb and if you know the group then I highly suggest you purchase this! It’s affordable, it’s sustainable.
customer_reviews.author: Nyomi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I could not have asked for a better corset! The fit is perfect and it is very very sturdy. This is not a corset to excercise in and is not like the flimsy, latex things that I have seen "claiming" to be corsets. This is a true corset and is used frequently and correctly, it will gradually reduce the size of your waist. I love mine and plan on purchasing another once I fit into the next smallest size.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan G.

customer_reviews.title: but all in all I think it's a great buy! Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Size 12 and ordered 28" Fits well. The only con I have is more personal vs of the actual product... I have a long torso and this corset is a few inches short, but all in all I think it's a great buy! Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Vianey Waterman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not really happy with this, I thought by the reviews it would be pretty decent but I guess not, I got the mesh one and it’s very incomfortable, it also had a really weird smell to it when i took it out of the package so overall I’m just disappointed, already started the return
customer_reviews.author: kaitland

customer_reviews.title: Item Was Used
customer_reviews.text: Product was definitely used, smelled like cigarettes had lint and pet fur on the inside.In my picture you can see the lint and pet fur on the inside as well as the inner picture lifting up from use and the yellow off colored tag. If I wanted a used item I should have been charged for a used item.
customer_reviews.author: nalla

customer_reviews.title: Not for regular torso girls
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think I have a short torso but this thing pushed my boobs all the way to my chin practically. It’s so long. If it wasn’t for that, I would have liked it...I’ll buy a short torso corset next time I guess.
customer_reviews.author: M Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Now THIS is a true corset!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality corset, without costing over a hundred dollars. It is beautiful, and seems very sturdy. The only reason I don't give it five stars is the closure system in front. I'm having a bit of difficulty figuring out how to fasten and unfasten it by myself. I think I will get the hang of it, but just want you to be aware that it may take some practice. I would, however, definitely recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Jacee

customer_reviews.title: Love this corset
customer_reviews.text: Love this corset. Comes laced up for beginners. Well made. My only complaint is that its a little long for my torso. (i'm 5'3) so when i sit down it pushes my breasts up and becomes uncomfortable. If you are a taller lady you will love this corset. I will definitely be ordering again from this company, i will just be getting one of the shorter styles. Shipping was very prompt!
customer_reviews.author: K Morrison

customer_reviews.title: No steel bones! Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Not a real corset at all absolute junk! Waste of money and time! Absolutely 100% fake! No steel bones! Do Not waste your money or time!
customer_reviews.author: Ree

customer_reviews.title: The corset definitely does its job--it is sturdy, has a great shape
customer_reviews.text: The corset definitely does its job--it is sturdy, has a great shape, and is very flattering. I also found it to be very comfortable. However, the hooks in the front are very difficult to fasten, and bend easily. I'm not sure I'd recommend this corset unless you have a few people around to help you into it. I was going back and forth between giving this product 3 stars because of the hooks, but went with the 4 because it is very nice once you get it on.
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Intense
customer_reviews.text: Intense but actually comfortable. I can breath in this one and it really sinches the waist. I can tuck it under my jeans and have a seamless look. This is my second corset and it's much better than my first. The only issue, I had to bend the hooks a little to slide in better.
customer_reviews.author: Amdar

customer_reviews.title: Little large and shorter on me, but good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and size chart, but it still managed to be too large. Also, it is shorter than my torso. It has a large gap under my breasts. Other corsets haven't ever been too short? I'm not sure why it was like that for this one. Other than that the quality is exellent. Color is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Starshine

customer_reviews.title: So in love!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg ladies I love this corset. Please make sure you order the size that you measure yourself as. Yes seasoning is key! This keeps my posture upright and my waist clinched. It took me a good 10 minutes to put it on because I didnt have anyone to help me, made me sweat lol!
customer_reviews.author: Keke

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This corset is both pretty and sturdy. Much of the boning is flexible spring steel, which pulls you in but doesn't crimp like plastic. The floral satin is lovely on the outside, with a flat back lining that's comfortable against the skin. Nice strong and long laces are included, and it's set up to be easy to tighten by yourself pulling the center loops. This is the real deal at a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wass

customer_reviews.title: Great for waist training
customer_reviews.text: Followed the sizing chart posted and it fit perfectly. I wear it 8 to 10 hours a day. Comprised of steel bones as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Major

customer_reviews.title: One with hip gores is loooong
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to make this work, was so excited I ordered the PLAYGIRL LABEL 4 Layer Reinforced 26 Steel Boned Waist Training Shaper Corset without hip gores first and it was the right length but too small around my hips to drawl the waist in properly ( im 5''1 short with big hips and big boobs) so i ordered the PLAYGIRL LABEL 4 Layer Reinforced 26 Steel Boned Waist Training Shaper Corset with hip gores instead, well this one fit the hips but was much longer, too long. squished the hell out of my boobs digging into them lol..Oh well, quality material just wish they have a shorter one with hip gores.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Grava

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a real corset and it fits nicely except my torso is not quite long enough. I was going to use it under a dress to go to a wedding, but it is also very heavy. That is my fault though because I knew it had steel in it. I am going to save it for a Halloween costume as it is still a great corset.
customer_reviews.author: K. Spada

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made, but I believe it is just a little bit larger than it is supposed to be. It fits good but, I must be ready to buy one size smaller to get a true corset cinch. It may be all my fault for not reading the sizing closer. Normally the cinch is about 6 inches. This one says 6-7 inches. My bad, but this fits correct to size for now.
customer_reviews.author: Charli

customer_reviews.title: The material is sturdy and easy to apply by myself already
customer_reviews.text: I almost return this until I watched some YouTube reviews on breaking in the corset. I am only a quarter way into the 2 weeks of slowly breaking it in and I can definitely see the cinching effect. There is a bit of space still, which I read is normal during the breaking in process. Hopefully this will slowly fit by the end of the 2 weeks. The material is sturdy and easy to apply by myself already.
customer_reviews.author: JenJen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Good fit and quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Fits as expected. Not a dramatic hourglass, but still a beautiful silhouette. A little high for a short torso, but nice for me. 5'3", 110lbs, 26" waist. I bought a size 22". Prettier than an Orchard Corset but not as shapely.
customer_reviews.author: liberty

customer_reviews.title: Read instructions start with third clasp
customer_reviews.text: The service was fast and great!! Make sure you measure yourself because I guessed my size, but despite that they quickly shipped me my correct size. this is the real deal!! It’s heavy real steal boned I couldn’t believe it for the price. I did have a bit of trouble at first getting it on but that’s because I didn’t read the instructions; clasp it on the third hook first then continue with the rest. It’s only been two days but I can already see a difference big bonus gives breast a lift and covers lower belly flap. just order it you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Uniquely me

customer_reviews.title: Did my best to pull on the string to tighten
customer_reviews.text: Either I can't seem to figure out how to wear this, or it really isn't flattering on me. I have a long torso and this product seems too small. Did my best to pull on the string to tighten, but like anything, it squeezed the excess out on both ends (not a pleasant visual, sorry). Anyways, it just wasn't for me. I may give it as a gift to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: My First Corset!
customer_reviews.text: Since this is my very first corset, Im in LOVE. It fits perfect around my waist and it gives me the shape I desire. The feel of the material is wonderful, very soft against my skin and extremely comfortable to ware for an extended amount of time. I will definitely will be purchasing more in a future date.
customer_reviews.author: Tez

customer_reviews.title: 32" waist - ordered 30" - great fit & great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd corset from this company. It is an amazingly good quality for the price. In fact, it is much higher quality than a more expensive corset I bought a few years back. I'll use this white corset under by Victorian costume to give me the proper line. Based on my previous corsets, I know it will be comfortable. Don't hesitate to buy this. You will be please.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie's mom

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, a little cockeyed.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm fairly happy with this corset, it was a little more difficult to lace by myself than some of the other corsets I own but replacing laces is simple enough that I don't hold it against it. However, I'm not sure if it was banged up in travel or if it's a construction issue but my corset is doesn't lay straight and instead skews slightly and won't straighten no matter how much I adjust it. It's not quite enough to be terribly noticeable but it is a little bothersome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for waist shaping in subtropics
customer_reviews.text: Am loosing weight and working on getting an hour glass figure. Am very satisfied with this product. Live in Florida and the mesh corset is great, breathable, soft and comfortable to wear. Satin corsets tends to overheat me. The mesh here holds up well, color is true and I don't get uncomfortable out in the heat
customer_reviews.author: Mary W

customer_reviews.title: I love the PLAYGIRL label corsets
customer_reviews.text: I love the PLAYGIRL label corsets! I don't wear corsets all the time, just on occasions that require costumes or when I want to spice up my evening/ cocktail attire. They are impeccably constructed and gorgeous. I own 2 corsets by them and I'm pretty certain I'll be buying more in the future. I am a 27" natural waist and 36" hip and the 22" corset fits like a dream. Their sizing chart is on point.
customer_reviews.author: Robinson Crusoe Island

customer_reviews.title: Real waist training steel bone corset, not costume.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this corset, (real steel bone) I have bought a lot of corsets that said steel bone and they were not, this one from true corset is! I do wast training and need to buy a new one cus I dropped a couple sizes and the company that made my old corset is no longer in business. Very happy with my purchase. (It is the real deal )
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Quintanilla

customer_reviews.title: Impressed, pleasantly over expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This is a bonafide high quality underbust corset. I haven't ever been this impressed with a product I've ordered trying to be inexpensive off Amazon. It's heavy, in a good "this is from a by gone era and is made with care" way. The details are perfect, and it's beautiful material (i got the rust) if you're debating it take the plunge. I've seen corsets like this for 200$ at fairies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, great quality corset!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this corset!!! Super high quality and cinches very well. Only thing is the laces are suupppeerrr long and in so making it harder to wear under things. It like trails the ground before trying in a bow and goes down past my knees after. That is my only complaint though. For the price this corset is gold!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Borris

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a well constructed quality corset! I used my waist measurement to order and it’s perfect! I love love the hour glass shape it gives me! My waist is 32 and I ordered a 26.
customer_reviews.author: M Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing amazing
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid, I was extremely pleased with the quality of the corset. It’s heavy weighted than other corsets for the same price range and very well put together. Perfect for waist training and tight lacing. The only complaint I have is the modesty panel is a little short length wise so it doesn’t cover the bottom and top row of the lace. I will definitely be buying this brand again in the future. I would like to try an over bust from them as well. For the price you can’t beat the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hour Glass Figure!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Ordered as a fashion accessory, so cant comment on the waist training but it seems capable. Now the customer service is great, originally I ordered the wrong size (I was a little optimistic) and 2 days later had the replacement at my door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works wonders ! What are you waiting for?
customer_reviews.text: Wowwwww! Get this now! I am amazed at how well this shrinks the waist in the first try!! It's sooo easy the apply just follow directions , 3 simple steps and you're done! You'll fall in love! It's super comfy too, you don't feel the steel at all, such a high quality garment! My waist is a 39" and I ordered the 34 and it fit perfectly! No complaints, I'm ordering the black one ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Be kind 💋

customer_reviews.title: Not good for petites
customer_reviews.text: Runs small and the back fabric cover flap is oddly shaped (rectangle vs. triangle). Also not good for petite (short torso) persons it extends too high and low for me. I am 5'3
customer_reviews.author: oops

customer_reviews.title: Fit a little on small side. That’s my fault ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit a little on small side. That’s my fault. I will keep for whenever i size down;)! I was so impressed with the overall quality of garment I ordered another one in correct size:). I will definitely be doing business with y’all again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't get as small of a size as they say
customer_reviews.text: I have a size 29 waist so I got the 22 which is what they say to do on the size chart. They state in the paperwork that they will not accept returns from items that have been pulled tight because it will loose shape. This makes sense but I decided to return because I didn't feel comfortable trying it on. It seemed to be a great quality. I have no experience with corsets.
customer_reviews.author: Glo

customer_reviews.title: The material is not stretch, and it’s very hard ...
customer_reviews.text: The material is not stretch, and it’s very hard to fit it in, and I think it should have more clips and be more adaptable to the body because the shape is not well formed
customer_reviews.author: Zaira

customer_reviews.title: One of my best corsets
customer_reviews.text: I really cannot find the right words to describe this corset. Excellent for waist training and tight-lacing. I love love love it. The material is sturdy, not like the flimsy mesh out there. I would recommend this over and over again
customer_reviews.author: 'cisc

customer_reviews.title: Okay so this thing is awesome. When I opened the package
customer_reviews.text: Okay so this thing is awesome. When I opened the package, I heard George Carlin's voice say "HEAVY DUTY." It is solid construction with strong fabric. the design is simple and elegant and all the parts matched up perfectly. The fit is like a dream, I am 5'9 and am able to sit, drive and do anything but bend comfortably, but bending is for wussies and old celery stalks. I've been wearing it for over 8 hours today and can actually feel my spine pulling into the proper alignment. I plan on getting the other colors. This corset is well worth the money, you WILL Not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: flea

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: Hurt my ribs badly even when worn correctly. :/ I dont reccomend. Also doesnt even fit me right, the tops of the waist trainer are out and doesnt work under any clothes. Mine still have the tags. Wish they did refunds
customer_reviews.author: 😄💜😄💜

customer_reviews.title: never will I buy from another, I am IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have had other corsets and they were not. This is the real McCoy, full boning, solid, beautiful. It does the job and then some. I am buying another almost when I am done writing this. For the price I have seen NO contenders. The fabric is very pretty as well as sturdy.Do yourself a favor, if you are reading this, believe me, pick out one you like and just buy it!! You wont regret it
customer_reviews.author: Sammi

customer_reviews.title: Quite interesting
customer_reviews.text: Fits wonderfully around waist. But the hip pcs are a bit odd looking. Accent the hips a bit more than I'd usually want. But I think with the right skirt it will be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: steampunk connoisseur

product_meta.title: Playgirl Label 4 Layer Reinforced 26 Steel Boned Waist Training Shaper Corset
feature_bullets: 26 high density steel bone details and corset measurements diagram are in the images.
4 Layers of cloth : 1 x Taffeta outer layer : 2 x Reinforcing cotton middle layers : 1 x Extra strength cotton inner lining layer
Please see the size chart in the images for detailed sizing instructions. Do not use the Amazon size chart.
Designed to pull in the wearers waist, flatten the tummy, improve posture and give a 6-7" waist reduction. Ideal for waist training and weight loss.
VERY IMPORTANT - When buying, make sure the seller is True Corset. Playgirl is a registered trademark and is ONLY sold by True Corset on Amazon. AVOID COUNTERFEITS. Details below.
